title: Play it safe electrically

description: Warns children of the dangers of flying kites near overhead power lines; shows the dangers of climbing trees through which power lines run; identifies electircal substations and notes the inherent dangers; illustrates the consequences of touching fallen power lines and notes the dangers of using electrical equipment near water. Suitable for secondary level and teacher/tertiary level.k
